select ps.id, ps.nickname, ps.avatar, ps.phone, ps.province_code, ps.city_code, ps.district_code, ps.detail_address from digital_shop ps left join (select shop_id, count(*) as product_orders_count from product_orders where order_status != 5 group by shop_id) po on ps.id = po.shop_id left join (select shop_id, count(*) as accessory_orders_count from accessory_orders where order_status != 5 group by shop_id) go on ps.id = go.shop_id where ps.audit_status = 2 and ps.is_deleted = 0 order by (coalesce(product_orders_count, 0) + coalesce(accessory_orders_count, 0)) desc, ps.create_time limit 6;
